titleStmt.title: Indago astrologica: or, a brief and modest enquiry into some principal points of astrology, as it was delivered by the fathers of it, and is now generally received by the sons of it. / By Joshua Childrey of Feversham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Childrey, J. (Joshua), 1623-1670.

titleStmt.title: Indago astrologica: or, a brief and modest enquiry into some principal points of astrology, as it was delivered by the fathers of it, and is now generally received by the sons of it. / By Joshua Childrey of Feversham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Childrey, J. (Joshua), 1623-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleet-street, near the Inner-Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
